ext_description.message: This extension lets you select text to search from multiple sources and displays the results in a single pop-up screen.

option_basic_settings_description.message: Configure basic settings such as display and search method

option_show_column_number_description.message: Set the number of columns to display

option_results_width_description.message:
Set the display screen size
Select 100% for full screen

option_results_opacity_description.message:
Set the opacity for display screen
Select 100% for full opacity

option_font_family_description.message:
Set the font name
Displays results in the configured font

option_font_size_description.message: Select a font size derived from the 100% standard size

option_contextmenu_description.message:
Add MultiLookup to your right-click context menu
The context menu supports opening this Options Page and searching specific sites when text is selected
*Right-clicking will display sites when text is selected, and the options link when text is not selected

option_middle_click_lookup_description.message:
Click the middle button (scroll wheel) when text is selected to search
*Does not require the modifier key

option_dblclick_lookup_description.message:
Double-click to search
*Does not require the modifier key

option_modifier_key_description.message: Perform search only when the modifier key is pressed (ALT, CTRL, SHIFT, META)

option_lookup_history_description.message:
Supports search history (saves terms and phrases by search type, i.e. dictionary, translation, and search)
Your history can be accessed from the quick search menu when you click on the extension icon

option_siteinfo_settings_description.message:
These are the dictionary, translation and search sites used by MultiLookup
You can make your site selections and configure update settings
*Pre-select certain sites for easy searching while you're browsing the web

option_select_siteinfo_description.message:
Select your sites
  • Drag and drop between Unselected Sites and Selected Sites
  • Double-click site entries for detailed information
  • Checkmark boxes on the left to add them to your default sites
    • Default sites will be searched automatically when text is selected and during browser actions (when sites are not specified)
  • The order of sites below will be the order of results displayed

option_manage_siteinfo_db_description.message:
Enter the URL for a new site info database.
The following databases are currently added. The language will be selected upon installation according to your browser settings.
Ja: http://wedata.net/databases/Lookup/items.json
En: http://wedata.net/databases/Lookup_en/items.json
After adding site info, click Update in the Update Site Info section. Your added databases will be reflected in the Site Selection section.
*You can can add databases from sources outside of Wedata as long as they are in JSON format.

option_warning_add_siteinfo_db_duplicate.message: The database you entered is already available

option_update_siteinfo_description.message:
Acquire site info from Wedata (database lookup) to update site info
*May update changed sites

option_advanced_settings_description.message: Change the search string languages, regular expressions used to distinguish search types (dictionary, translation, and search), and modify, delete, or add new sites

option_advanced_settings_warning_message.message: *WARNING: These settings affect the operation of this extension. Preceed with caution.

option_limit_length_description.message:
Select the maximum number of characters to search
Longer search strings increase load

option_xhr_timeout_description.message: Set the timeout in milliseconds for acquiring XmlHttpRequest results

option_lookup_limit_result_length_descri.message:
Set the maximum characters for XmlHttpRequest results
Large HTML requests will increase the load for sanitizing results

option_language_detect_api_description.message:
The Google Translation API is used to detect language
The API produces more accurate detection for better results, but may increase connection time before displaying results

option_enable_detect_language_api.message: Use the API and the Regular Expressions

option_language_detect_regexp_descriptio.message: Define regular expressions for detecting each language

option_set_language_detect_regexp_messag.message: Set the regular expressions used for detecting language when text is selected

option_type_detect_description.message:
Set regular expressions used to select search type when text is selected
Search types are dictionary, translation, and search

option_siteinfo_edit_description.message: Add new site info and modify or delete current site info

option_edit_siteinfo_attention.message:
*Check the Terms of Use for each site before adding it
name, url, type, and src-lang are required fields

option_initialize_settings_description.message: *Reset basic and advanced settings to default settings

option_initialize_siteinfo_description.message: Reset site info to default settings

option_initialize_all_description.message: *All settings and site info will be reset to default settings

option_usage_information.message: Follow the link below for more information on using MultiLookup

option_report_description.message:
Use the form below to submit requests or to report issues. When reporting issues, include details on how to reproduce them.
Report information will be logged as Admin Site Tickets.
Share your thoughts in the comments at MultiLookup - Google Chrome Extension Gallery.

option_update_failed.message:
Upload failed
 Please try again later

option_input_additional_language_notice.message: Enter the language to be added (ASCII characters only)

option_input_additional_type_notice.message: Enter the type to be added (ASCII characters only)

option_json_syntax_error.message: Incorrect format. Please enter in correct JSON format.

option_reset_all_confirm.message: Reset all settings and site info to default settings?

option_send_report_succeeded.message: Submission successfully. You can confirm the report details and status below.

option_send_report_failed.message:
Submission failed
 Please try again later

background_error_not_such_siteinfo.message: No sites match your type of search

background_error_no_lookup_entry.message: No search sites are selected. Add search sites from the Options Page.

background_error_over_lookup_limit_lengt.message: The search string length exceeds the limit ($1)
